name: Style Guide for Mobile App design
description:
What is an app style guide?


A UI Style Guide is a set of rules established for the graphic elements involved in a Web or Mobile App; UI Style Guides could be digital or printed documentation used to keep track and explain all user interface elements and visual aspects of the App


Benefits of a style guide:

⦿ They're Error-free

⦿ They're easy to use

⦿ They're easy to comprehend


Feel free to use it for your upcoming Mobile App Design.
